TownMap.Description: Leave on Default Unless you are using multiple map changing mods

River.Description: Turns the dried-up quarry into water, more aesthitically pleasing and better for fishing and SVE compatability.

Forest.Description: Removes two houses and adds a forested patch instead. Automatically deactivated if ARV is installed.

Skin.Description: Changes the buildings to Kaya's Santorini buildings (Kaya) or Yri's Projecy Yellog buildings (Yri), or the original ES buildings (NewEastScarpe - default).

EnableMeadowFarm.Description: Adds the farmable map between East Scarp and Deep Mountains.

WalkTidePools.Description: Allows you (and NPCs) to walk across the tidal pools. You can still fish in them!

ObeliskOptions.Description: Choose the Obelisk that best matches your style: vanilla, glass or garden (Overwritten by Gwen's)

FlowersSpring.AllowValues: False, RoseWhite, ClematisBlue, WisteriaBlue, WisteriaPink, WisteriaPurple, WisteriaRed, WisteriaWhite, WisteriaYellow
FlowersSpring.Description: For Yri's Projecy Yellog only: choose your flower color per season

FlowersSummer.AllowValues: False, RoseWhite, ClematisBlue, WisteriaBlue, WisteriaPink, WisteriaPurple, WisteriaRed, WisteriaWhite, WisteriaYellow
FlowersSummer.Description: For Yri's Projecy Yellog only: choose your flower color per season

FlowersFall.AllowValues: False, WisteriaFBlue, WisteriaFPink, WisteriaFPurple, WisteriaFRed, WisteriaFWhite, WisteriaFYellow
FlowersFall.Description: For Yri's Projecy Yellog only: choose your flower color per season

farmcave_trapdoorx.Description: X coordinate placement of where you would like a trapdoor to be placed in your farmcave

farmcave_trapdoory.Description: Y coordinate placement of where you would like a trapdoor to be placed in your farmcave

farmcave_exitx.Description: X coordinate placement of where you would like the trapdoor to exit in your farmcave (suggested, same X as the placement above)

farmcave_exity.Description: Y coordinate placement of where you would like the trapdoor to be exit in your farmcave (suggested, Y + 1 from the placement above)

Changes.Target: Maps/spring_EastScarpe, Maps/summer_EastScarpe, Maps/fall_EastScarpe, Maps/winter_EastScarpe,Maps/spring_lighthouse, Maps/summer_lighthouse, Maps/fall_lighthouse, Maps/winter_lighthouse
Maps/spring_cottage, Maps/summer_cottage, Maps/fall_cottage, Maps/winter_cottage, Maps/lemurfurniture, Maps/lemur_coffeeshop
